coffees.name: Plain Latte
coffees.descrip: Our Rock-a-Billy Goat Blend house roasted espresso blended with steamed milk.

coffees.name: Mocha
coffees.descrip: Our house blend espresso blended with milk chocolate and steamed milk.

coffees.name: White Mocha
coffees.descrip: Our house blend espresso blended with Ghirardelli white chocolate and steamed milk.

coffees.name: Cold Brewed Coffee
coffees.descrip: Iced Coffee cold brewed and triple strained!

coffees.name: Shot in the Dark
coffees.descrip: Our house blend espresso pulled and added to our fresh brewed house coffee.

coffees.name: Breve
coffees.descrip: Our house espresso blended with steamed half and half.

coffees.name: Americano
coffees.descrip: Our house blend espresso poured over hot water...lighter in body and acidity than house coffee but bold in flavor.

coffees.name: Chai Latte
coffees.descrip: We use David Rio Tiger Chai! Creamy, sweet and spicy!

coffees.name: Hot Cocoa
coffees.descrip: Hershey's syrup and steamed milk...also available with White chocolate...topped with marshmallows or whipped cream.

coffees.name: Steamer
coffees.descrip: Any flavor syrup you want mixed with steamed milk.

coffees.name: Flavored Hot Cocoa
coffees.descrip: Mix any flavor syrup with Hershey's chocolate and steamed milk.

coffees.name: Turtle Mocha
coffees.descrip: Chocolate, Caramel and Toffee Nut.

coffees.name: Monkey Mocha
coffees.descrip: Chocolate and Banana.

coffees.name: Elvis Mocha
coffees.descrip: Chocolate, Peanut Butter and Banana.

coffees.name: Almond Joyful Mocha
coffees.descrip: Chocolate, Almond and Coconut.

coffees.name: German Cake Mocha
coffees.descrip: Chocolate, Hazelnut, Coconut and Caramel.

coffees.name: Mexican Mocha
coffees.descrip: Dark Chocolate and Cinnamon.

coffees.name: Campfire Mocha
coffees.descrip: Chocolate and Toasted Marshmallow.

coffees.name: P.B. Mocha
coffees.descrip: Chocolate and Peanut Butter.

coffees.name: Andy's Mint Mocha
coffees.descrip: Tastes like an Andes Mint candy!

coffees.name: Italian Job Mocha
coffees.descrip: White Chocolate and Tiramisu.

coffees.name: Peppermint Panda
coffees.descrip: Peppermint Panda Mocha. Chocolate and Peppermint...tastes like a Yorkshire Peppermint Patty.

coffees.name: Candy Orange Mocha
coffees.descrip: Dark Chocolate and Orange.

coffees.name: Em's Shamrock Mocha
coffees.descrip: Chocolate, Peppermint and Irish Cream.

coffees.name: Macadamia Nut Mocha
coffees.descrip: Milk Chocolate and Macadamia Nut.

coffees.name: Wildberry Mocha
coffees.descrip: Chocolate, Blackberry and Raspberry.

coffees.name: White Hazelnut Mocha
coffees.descrip: White Chocolate and Hazelnut.

coffees.name: Voldemort Latte
coffees.descrip: Tastes like an almond biscotti! Lite chocolate, almond, vanilla and Macadamia Nut.

coffees.name: C3PO Latte
coffees.descrip: Coconut and Irish Cream.

coffees.name: Caramel Macchiato
coffees.descrip: Yes, the one Starbucks made famous...Lite Vanilla syrup, espresso, steamed milk, topped with thick velvety foam and a caramel drizzle!

coffees.name: Cina-Bun Latte
coffees.descrip: Brown Sugar and Cinnamon syrups blended with espresso, steamed milk, topped with whipped cream, caramel drizzle and cinnamon powder!

coffees.name: Banana's Foster Latte
coffees.descrip: Banana, Butter Rum and Caramel.

coffees.name: Honey Bunny Latte
coffees.descrip: Honey, Vanilla and Almond.

coffees.name: Lucky Irishman Latte
coffees.descrip: Caramel Sauce and Irish Cream.

coffees.name: Banana Bread Latte
coffees.descrip: Banana and Brown Sugar Cinnamon.

coffees.name: Dumbledore
coffees.descrip: White Chocolate, Caramel, Banana and Butter Rum topped with Nutmeg.

coffees.name: Master Chief
coffees.descrip: Dark Chocolate, Tiramisu and Almond.

coffees.name: Giddy Bomb
coffees.descrip: 4 shots of espresso, chocolate, white chocolate, caramel and a splash of cream.

coffees.name: Hot Teas
coffees.descrip: Montana Tea and Spice Co. Teas.

coffees.name: Frozen Coffees
coffees.descrip: A blend of RA base mixes, cold brewed house espresso, milk and syrups.

coffees.name: Seasonals
coffees.descrip: Ask about our seasonal specials.

coffees.name: Milks Available
coffees.descrip: Whole, Skim, Half and Half, Soy or Almond.
